title: The Shattered Conscience
description: From the author of the Amazon Bestseller “The Prediction”Connor Harrigan lives a simple expat life in Amsterdam, with a beautiful wife and twelve-year-old daughter. When a bomb blasts through the centre, killing his wife and putting his daughter in a coma, he is forced to confront a dark past he so desperately wanted to forget. Detective Sophie Reyner is struggling as a single-parent with a demanding job. When assigned to the bomb investigation she forms a friendship with Harrigan that takes them down a path of drug-trafficking and murder... The Shattered Conscience is a thriller intertwined with a human tale about dealing with mistakes from the past and how far you would go to protect the ones you love.
author: Darren Sugrue
